com.tgc
Class Line

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<ChartItem>
              com.tgc.Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<ChartItem>, Collection<ChartItem>, List<ChartItem>, RandomAccess
 class Line
extends ArrayList<ChartItem>

The Line class is only a ArrayList of ChartItems It calculates the mins and maxs quickly while adding or removeing
